price: 13. Et Il a soumis pour vous tout ce qu’il y a dans les cieux et sur terre, car tout provient de Lui. Il y a certes là des Signes pour des gens qui savent réfléchir.
arabic: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا مِّنۡهُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wasakhara lakum mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi jamīʿan min'hu inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yatafakkarūna
